author: Lon.TV
description:
See more in the free app series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnItwUd17GYPSXE_BW-5P579J - In the latest edition of my free app hidden gem series, we take a look at Retro Achievements : a free service that allows you to earn achievement points in retro game emulators! Most retro consoles and games are now supported! See more retro : https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIswkmY7xCvaH3K_78rUsEIO and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:26 - Achievement Demo
01:44 - Getting Started
02:33 - Hardcore vs. Softcore mode
03:29 - How achivements work
03:48 - Following Friends
04:38 - Finding Compatible Games / ROMs
05:31 - Demo on Saturn game
07:12 - Contributing Achievements
07:46 - No FPGA support
08:18 - Conclusion
